about_the_game:
Discover Super Rising Ball, a and challenging casual game! Rotate platforms with precision to make the ball rise to its next target and reach the top in this fun challenge.

Key Features:

  • Intuitive and fun gameplay: Rotate platforms with precision to help the ball rise and reach the top.

  • Unique customization: Unlock up to 30 adorable skins for your ball and personalize your gaming experience.

  • Collectible album: Complete a unique album with more than 70 collectibles.

  • Accessible for everyone: Easy-to-learn controls, but with challenges to test your skills and reflexes.

Get ready for a fun-filled experience in Super Rising Ball. Take your ball to the top!

  • Accessible for everyone: Easy-to-learn controls, but with challenges to test your skills and reflexes.

Get ready for a fun-filled experience in Super Rising Ball. Take your ball to the top!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or newer.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (quad-core) or higher, or Apple M1 chip.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, AMD Radeon R9 M290, or equivalent.
  • Storage: 240 MB available space

name: Super Rising Ball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300, or higher.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750, or higher.
  • Storage: 240 MB available space

short_description: Super Rising Ball is a challenging game where you rotate objects with precision to make the ball rise to its next target and reach the top. Avoid the lasers and see if you’re up for the challenge! Unlock 30 unique skins and complete your collectible album!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
